member.name: NMREBARSPLITTER
member.summary: Contains information used to handle an RBN_SPLITTERDRAG notification code.

member.name: NMREBARSPLITTER.hdr
member.summary: An structure that contains additional information about this notification.

member.name: NMREBARSPLITTER.rcSizing
member.summary: An structure that indicates the size the rebar will be after the drag operation completes.
